sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"勇敢的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: bold, brave, courageous, daring, heroic, fearless
means: bold ： 侧重指面对困难或危险时勇往直前，勇于进取的勇敢精神。
brave ： 含义广泛，指天生的勇敢，无所畏惧地面对困难与危险，侧重胆识与果断。
courageous ： 正式用词，侧重指在一切情况下都有胆量，无所畏惧，强调基于道德信念，经深思熟虑后所产生的勇敢。
daring ： 强调面临意外或危险时胆大心细，头脑冷静。褒义贬义均可用，贬义指胆大妄为。
heroic ： 正式用词，多指在战争或重大危险时，为他人为事业忘我献身的英雄气概。
fearless ： 语气肯定，侧重在危险时无所畏惧，毫无动摇。

sentence.Network_en: It was a courageous decision, and one that everybody admired.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是一个勇敢的决定，也是一个为所有人赞赏的决定。

sentence.Network_en: It was a very frightening experience and they were very courageous.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是一次让人胆战心惊的经历，而他们表现得非常勇敢。

sentence.Network_en: Louis was shown as an intelligent, courageous and virtuous family man.
sentence.Network_cn: 路易斯在人们眼里是一个智慧、勇敢、品德高尚的顾家男人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French corageus, from corage (see courage)

entry.tran: 勇敢的;有胆量的;无畏的
entry.def: Someone who is courageous shows courage.

example.ex: It was a very frightening experience and they were very courageous...
example.tran: 那是一次让人胆战心惊的经历，而他们表现得非常勇敢。

example.ex: It was a courageous decision, and one that everybody admired.
example.tran: 那是一个勇敢的决定，也是一个为所有人赞赏的决定。

means.word_mean: 1. possessing or displaying courage; able to face and deal with danger or fear without flinching;

sentences.sentence: "Familiarity with danger makes a brave man braver but less daring"- Herman Melville
"a frank courageous heart...triumphed over pain"- William Wordsworth
"set a courageous example by leading them safely into and out of enemy-held territory"

auth_sentence.content: That was Margaret Thatcher at her courageous best.
auth_sentence.res_content: That was Margaret Thatcher at her courageous best.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That was Margaret Thatcher at her courageous best.

auth_sentence.content: Three courageous and dedicated soldiers have made the ultimate sacrifice.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表示"……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严格的,严厉的,严酷的,严密的,严谨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rigor严格,严厉,苛刻,严密+ous……的→adj.严格的,严厉的,严酷的,严密的,严谨的
advantage优势,有利条件,利益+ous……的→adj.有利的,有助的
courage勇气,精神+ous……的→adj.勇敢的,无畏的
danger危险,危险物,威胁+ous……的→adj.危险的,不安全的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有毒的,恶意的,恶毒的,道德败坏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: poison毒药+ous……的→adj.有毒的,恶意的,恶毒的,道德败坏的

Sentence.sentence: If this were a Hollywood movie, the courageous old Indiana farmer would beat the profit-minded corporation before the credits rolled.

sentences.en: He was roused to action by courageous words.
sentences.cn: 豪言壮语促使他奋起行动。

sentences.en: He was a very fine man,indeed I’ll go further,he was the most courageous man I ever knew.
sentences.cn: 他是个非常好的人,我甚至可以说,他是我所知道的最有勇气的人。
